channel.title: I need a really smart person for this simple question! plz!1
channel.description: How can I make an item be removed when you go to wield the other item, but it goes to your inventory and unequips itself while you have that item on?

what that basicly does is if your weapon is in the 2hweapons array, it will add your shield to the inventory then set your shield to -1 which is nothing, but like i said that is just a base it most likely wont work

item.source: I need a really smart person for this simple question! plz!1

item.title: I need a really smart person for this simple question! plz!1
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

well I made a code or just used one and then made it into a void, but all it does is just remove the shield but when you look at the slot in equipment thing the shield is still while it doesn’t show.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2007, 10:09:11 PM[/size][hr][quote=“xx nub xx, post:8, topic:145311”]you have to add some code in process, its not already in the server unless the base your using has it

just add something like

public static int 2hweapons = {all 2h weapons here};

if(playerEquip[playerWeapon] = int 2hweapons {
addItem(playerEquip[playerShield], 1);
playerEquip[playerSheild] = -1;
}

that probably wont work cuz i made it in like 10 seconds but you can try something like that[/quote]

You get that I’m trying to remove the shield and also make the shield go back to the inventory right?

Read full topic
item.source: I need a really smart person for this simple question! plz!1

item.title: I need a really smart person for this simple question! plz!1
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

you have to add some code in process, its not already in the server unless the base your using has it

just add something like

public static int 2hweapons = {all 2h weapons here};

if(playerEquip[playerWeapon] = int 2hweapons {
addItem(playerEquip[playerShield], 1);
playerEquip[playerSheild] = -1;
}

that probably wont work cuz i made it in like 10 seconds but you can try something like that
